alert.note: Alert for Henry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 20 at 4:46PM CDT until August 20 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Henry County in southeastern Alabama... Western Clay County in southwestern Georgia... Southwestern Randolph County in southwestern Georgia... South central Quitman County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 630 PM EDT/530 PM CDT/. * At 546 PM EDT/446 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located over Fort Gaines, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fort Gaines, Days Crossroads, Shorterville, Walter F. George Lock And Dam, Walter F George Lake, Standleys Store, Otho, Watson Crossroads, Moores Crossroads, Ricks Place, Pecan, Garnersville, Bagby State Park, Coleman, Hatcher, Jones Crossing, Bethel, Cotton Hill and Fort Gaines-Clay Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
